class account.forms.EestecerChangeForm(*args, **kargs)¶

Bases: django.contrib.auth.forms.UserChangeForm

A form for updating users. Includes all the fields on the user, but replaces the password field with admin’s password hash display field.

account.models module¶

class account.models.Eestecer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: django.contrib.auth.models.AbstractBaseUser, django.contrib.auth.models.PermissionsMixin

A fully featured User model with admin-compliant permissions that uses a full-length email field as the username. It stores additional information about eestecers.

Email and password are required. Other fields are optional.

email = None¶

email adress

skype = None¶

Skype contact info.

hangouts = None¶

Hangouts contact info

mobile = None¶

Mobile Phone number of the user. Mostly used for contact during events.

first_name = None¶

First name

last_name = None¶

Last name

date_of_birth = None¶

Date of birth

profile_picture¶

A profile picture to be used on the website. Without a Profile picture the user will not appear in lists

gender = None¶

Gender of the applicant. Useful for overview on Gender balance.

tshirt_size = None¶

T-shirt size. Used for events

passport_number = None¶

Passport number required by many hostels. Makes it easier for organizers.

food_preferences = None¶

Food preferences, for example vegetarian or no pork.

date_joined = None¶

Should be set by the user to the time they joined eestec. For new users it will be the moment they register with the website

events_participated()¶

Returns the number of Events a User has been to

last_event()¶

Returns the Date of the last Event a User has been to

is_staff = None¶

Designates whether the user can log into this admin site
